Section V. Abstract of the Pendulum Observations at
       the Lower Station.

<s>39</s>37. No correction <s>[?]</s> was applied to the immediate
readings of the instruments, except that the Barometer-reading
was increased by o.016, which was required to make
its indications correspond to those of the upper Barometer.

     First Series.  Pendulum 8 below.

[Table not transcribed]
